studies.title: HTML5: Web Fundamentals
studies.description: This course focuses on completely mastering the Internet's native markup language (HTML) and providing the necessary skills to enter the world of web design.

studies.title: Full Stack Developer Jr
studies.description: The training course titled 'Web Full Stack Junior Profile' is offered under the 'Argentina Programa 4.0' Plan.

studies.title: English Course: Level 8
studies.description: Level 8 English Course at the University Language Center for Software Developers, based on the B1.2 level of the Common European Framework of Reference for Languages (CEFR), as part of the 'Argentina Programa 4.0' Plan.

studies.title: Bootcamp Front-End Web Developer
studies.description: This program uses a synchronous study methodology to train Front End Web Developers. It emphasizes challenging real projects to ensure thorough learning and mastery of essential Web Development skills. The program offers hands-on experience with various technologies and tools like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, Ajax, JSON, APIs, and Bootstrap.

projects.name: Portfolio Web
projects.description: Portfolio Web, developed by Morgana Luz Alemann, showcases various web applications, websites, and other digital projects. The website serves as a platform to highlight the creator's web development skills, technical abilities, design aesthetics, and creativity. Visitors can explore the projects to gain insights into the diverse web development work showcased on the site.

projects.name: I-Ching
projects.description: This website, created in collaboration with two other individuals as part of a freelance group called I-Chill, is dedicated to exploring and studying the I Ching, also known as the Book of Changes. We aim to provide an in-depth understanding of this ancient Chinese divination system. We offer various resources, such as articles, interpretations, and online consultations, to help visitors gain insights into their journeys and make decisions based on the wisdom of the I Ching.

projects.name: Amazing Events
projects.description: Created as part of a Front-End bootcamp practice at MindHub, Amazing Events is a website that showcases an event planning and management company. The website provides information about the services offered by the company, including event organization, venue selection, and catering. It features a visually appealing design and presents an overview of the company's past events through captivating photos and inspiring testimonials.
